des:
WARNING: This skill is still in early development and is not ready for consumption.

This Smart Timer skill enhances your timer experience by automatically stopping the notification sound 8 seconds after the timer completes. Whether you're in the kitchen, at the gym, or managing your daily routine, this skill provides a seamless and less intrusive timer alert.

Key Features:

Smart Sound Stop: The skill intelligently stops the timer notification sound after 8 seconds, allowing you to receive the alert without any prolonged disturbance.

Flexible Timers: Set timers for any duration using voice commands, and enjoy the convenience of automatic sound stop.

Voice Interaction: Utilize natural language commands like "Alexa, set new timer for 20 minutes" to make timer setup effortless.

How to Use:

Enable the skill by saying, "Alexa, enable Smart Timer."
Set a timer by saying, "Alexa, set new timer for [duration]."
When the timer reaches zero, the notification sound will play for 8 seconds before automatically stopping.

Example Commands:

"Alexa, set new timer for 10 minutes."
"Alexa, start new timer for 30 seconds."
